title: Settings Won't Save
body: Hey! Can someone help? I reinstalled the new alpha client and my in game settings won't save. I have to change then every time I get into game. More specifically my quickcast settings and my hud scale settings won't save. Any help would be awesome!

replies.body:
It sounds like your input settings file saved server-side may be having some issues. I recommend we complete a reset of this file using the following method. You'll want to **log into the Client** then leave it running in the background while you head to your config folder, which should be in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, you're clear to hop into a custom match alone to confirm your settings can now be configured and saved without redoing them again. Please let me know if this fixed the issue for you. :)
Awesome!! It definitely did. Thank you so much!! :)
